description: Dashboard which shows current outages from Nodes, Interfaces and Services in selected Surveillance Categories.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  bsm_service.name,
  bsmAlarm.firsteventtime,
  bsmAlarm.lasteventtime,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.firsteventtime)) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.firsteventtime)) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.firsteventtime)) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM age(now(), bsmAlarm.lasteventtime))::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  bsm_service
JOIN
  (SELECT
    substring(reductionkey from '[0-9]+$')::INTEGER AS bsmId,
    alarms.firsteventtime,
    alarms.lasteventtime
  FROM
    alarms
  WHERE
    eventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/bsm/serviceProblem') AS bsmAlarm
ON
   bsmAlarm.bsmId = bsm_service.id
ORDER BY
  bsmAlarm.lasteventtime DESC,
  duration DESC,
  bsm_service.name ASC

SELECT
  node_alarms.location,
  node_alarms.nodelabel,
  node_alarms.lasteventtime,
  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime AS duration_raw,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  node_alarms
WHERE
  node_alarms.acknowledged = FALSE AND
  node_alarms.eventuei like 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeDown' AND
  node_alarms.location IN ($location) AND
  node_alarms.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  node_alarms.max_alarm_severity_unack = '6'
GROUP BY
  node_alarms.location,
  node_alarms.nodelabel,
  node_alarms.nodeid,
  node_alarms.firsteventtime,
  node_alarms.lasteventtime
ORDER BY
  duration_raw DESC,
  node_alarms.location ASC,
  node_alarms.nodelabel ASC

SELECT
  node_alarms.location,
  node_alarms.nodelabel,
  node_alarms.ipaddr,
  node_alarms.lasteventtime,
  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime AS duration_raw,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  node_alarms
WHERE
  node_alarms.acknowledged = FALSE AND
  node_alarms.eventuei like 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/interfaceDown' AND
  node_alarms.location IN ($location) AND
  node_alarms.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  node_alarms.max_alarm_severity_unack = '5'
GROUP BY
  node_alarms.location,
  node_alarms.nodeid,
  node_alarms.nodelabel,
  node_alarms.ipaddr,
  node_alarms.firsteventtime,
  node_alarms.lasteventtime
ORDER BY
  duration_raw DESC,
  node_alarms.location ASC,
  node_alarms.nodelabel ASC,
  node_alarms.ipaddr ASC

SELECT
  node_alarms.location,
  node_alarms.nodelabel,
  node_alarms.ipaddr,
  node_alarms.servicename,
  node_alarms.lasteventtime,
  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime AS duration_raw,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - node_alarms.firsteventtime)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  node_alarms
WHERE
  node_alarms.acknowledged = FALSE AND
  node_alarms.eventuei like 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeLostService' AND
  node_alarms.location IN ($location) AND
  node_alarms.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  node_alarms.max_alarm_severity_unack = '5'
GROUP BY
  node_alarms.location,
  node_alarms.nodeid,
  node_alarms.nodelabel,
  node_alarms.ipaddr,
  node_alarms.servicename,
  node_alarms.firsteventtime,
  node_alarms.lasteventtime
ORDER BY
  duration_raw DESC,
  node_alarms.location ASC,
  node_alarms.nodelabel ASC,
  node_alarms.ipaddr ASC,
  node_alarms.servicename ASC

panels.description: Availability for Nodes with outages in a selected Surveillance Category

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  n.location,
  n.nodelabel,
  100.0 - 100.0/(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo())) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom()))) * EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - GREATEST(n.iflostservice, to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom())))) AS availability,
  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice AS duration_raw,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  node_outages n
JOIN
  node_outage_status nos
ON
  n.nodeid = nos.nodeid
WHERE
  n.resolved = FALSE AND
  n.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeDown' AND
  nos.max_outage_severity = '6' AND
  n.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  n.location IN ($location)
GROUP BY
  n.location,
  n.nodelabel,
  n.eventseverity,
  n.iflostservice
ORDER BY
  duration_raw DESC,
  availability ASC,
  n.location ASC,
  n.nodelabel ASC

panels.title: Nodes in Category: $category

panels.description: Availability for Interfaces with outages in a selected Surveillance Category

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  n.location,
  n.nodelabel,
  n.ipaddr,
  100.0 - 100.0/(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo())) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom()))) * EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - GREATEST(n.iflostservice, to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom())))) AS availability,
  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice AS duration_raw,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  node_outages n
JOIN
  node_outage_status nos
ON
  n.nodeid = nos.nodeid
WHERE
  n.resolved = FALSE AND
  n.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/interfaceDown' AND
  nos.max_outage_severity = '5' AND
  n.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  n.location IN ($location)
GROUP BY
  n.location,
  n.nodelabel,
  n.iflostservice,
  n.ipaddr,
  n.eventseverity,
  n.svclosteventuei
ORDER BY
  duration_raw DESC,
  availability ASC,
  n.location ASC,
  n.nodelabel ASC,
  n.ipaddr ASC

panels.title: Node Interfaces in Category: $category

panels.description: Availability for Services with outages in a selected Surveillance Category

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  n.location,
  n.nodelabel,
  n.ipaddr,
  n.servicename,
  100.0 - 100.0/(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo())) - EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom()))) * EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - GREATEST(n.iflostservice, to_timestamp($__unixEpochFrom())))) AS availability,
  to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice AS duration_raw,
  EXTRACT(DAYS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'd ' || EXTRACT(HOURS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'h ' || EXTRACT(MINUTES FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice) || 'm ' || ROUND(EXTRACT(SECONDS FROM to_timestamp($__unixEpochTo()) - n.iflostservice)::NUMERIC,0) || 's' AS duration
FROM
  node_outages n
JOIN
  node_outage_status nos
ON
  n.nodeid = nos.nodeid
WHERE
  n.resolved = FALSE AND
  n.svclosteventuei = 'uei.opennms.org/nodes/nodeLostService' AND
  nos.max_outage_severity = '5' AND
  n.categoryname IN ($category) AND
  n.location IN ($location)
GROUP BY
  n.location,
  n.nodelabel,
  n.iflostservice,
  n.ipaddr,
  n.eventseverity,
  n.servicename
ORDER BY
  duration_raw DESC,
  availability ASC,
  n.location ASC,
  n.nodelabel ASC,
  n.ipaddr ASC,
  n.servicename ASC

panels.title: Node Services in Category: $category

list.label: Monitoring Location
list.name: location
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT(n.location) FROM node n ORDER BY location ASC

list.label: Surveillance Category
list.name: category
list.query: SELECT 'no category'::TEXT as categoryname UNION SELECT categoryname FROM categories ORDER BY categoryname

title: OpenNMS Outage Dashboard
